casino lucky wheel rigging cars.lua.author: melonarmy122
casino lucky wheel rigging cars.lua.description: Rigs the casino lucky wheel. Use before spinning to win the podium vehicle or a custom mystery car. After the first podium win, subsequent wins grant 20k RP. Recommended to use only once per day. Mystery cars have $0 sell value.

HeistToolFinal.lua.author: melonarmy122
HeistToolFinal.lua.description: Heist editor skidded from decompiled scripts and everyone in existence, made by myself.
